name: GRAAPH x Takumi Matsuo - Light & Shadow

metadata.name: The Umbrella | Light & Shadow | 1-of-1 Edition
metadata.description:
The Umbrella is an exclusive 1-of-1 NFT + Signed Artist Print pairing. It is limited to a single edition with the artist print being awarded to the original purchaser.

The Light & Shadow collection marks Tokyo street photographer Takumi Matsuo's debut NFT + Artist Print collection. The collection of personally curated works is comprised of 40 Open Edition NFTs and 10 1-of-1 NFT + Print Editions for collectors.
